attributes.title: Way too sus

attributes.title: I’m not part of the tik tok thing
attributes.review: I wanted to see what was going on with the president and the app took 3 DAYS to download and then won’t even open. Waste of time.

attributes.title: terrible!!
attributes.review: this app makes my phone crash all the time. on top of this, is the scariest thing once ever opened in my life. when opening the app, you can see our former president obama dressed up as an “oompa loompa” and it is quite terrifying. there are also many other problems with the app. in conclusion don’t get it✨
